verses.text: Where has your beloved gone, you fairest among women?
My beloved has gone down to his garden,
I am my belovedâ€™s, and my beloved is mine.
You are beautiful, my love, as Tirzah,
Turn away your eyes from me,
Your teeth are like a flock of ewes,
Your temples are like a piece of a pomegranate behind your veil.
There are sixty queens, eighty concubines,
My dove, my perfect one, is unique.
Who is she who looks out as the morning,
I went down into the nut tree grove,
